title: Stream: Pacific Air – Stop Talking
content:
Having smashed SXSW earlier in the year, our buddies in Pacific Air are set to take the rest of the world by storm with their debut LP, Stop Talking.

In little over a year the brothers have gone from relative unknowns to producing one of the essential summer albums of 2013. Featuring the singles Lose My Mind, So Strange and one of the songs of SXSW 13, Float, it’s a debut album that delves far deeper than the upbeat, anthem ready hooks that litter its surface. Dive into Stop Talking below and grab a copy on iTunes here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
